Name: Magic Market
About the game: Buy low and sell high! Help fund your arch-wizard overlords' research by trading potions and spells on the Magic Market. Use potions and cast spells to manipulate the market and earn even more money. But don't get caught by the Magical Exchange Commission or you'll pay a massive fine and get pushed back even further from your goal. Master this simple, yet fast-paced, strategy game by chaining spells together to maximize your earnings. Do you have what it takes or will you suffer your masters' wrath? -Fast-paced point-and-click strategy game -Link spells together for massive earnings -Earn money and upgrade your spells for bigger combos
